name: @junctionrelay/plugin-generic-api
description: Generic API collector plugin for JunctionRelay

setupInstructions.title: API Endpoint URL
setupInstructions.body: Enter the full URL to your JSON API endpoint. Must return JSON with `{ "success": true, "data": { ... } }` structure.

setupInstructions.title: Access Token
setupInstructions.body: API authentication token (if required). Sent as `X-Collector-Token` header. Leave blank if API does not require authentication.

setupInstructions.title: Expected Response Format
setupInstructions.body:
```json
{"success": true, "data": {"metric1": 123, "metric2": "value"}}
```
Each key-value pair in the `data` object becomes an individual sensor with smart categorization and unit detection.
